page.title: 10WEST SOMMERSET FREE PRESS
page.content: The{West Somerset Free Press,}the {Somerset County Gazette,}and the {Bridgwater Mercury}are published {weekly,}and are of interest to people in the Watchet locality. The{Western {Daily Press}is also a popular paper. These papers cover a wide spectrum of topics,including features,reports of local happenings,motor accidents and offences,Court proceedings, descriptions of agricultural shows, school sales etc. Reports and criticisms of locally produced amateur entertainments abound, and interesting accounts of school activities.Sport occupies considerable space:the progress of local teams and individuals in all sporting spheres is eagerly followed. Personal items are published,births,marriages,deaths etc. The newspaper is well illustrated.
